title: Finance Analyst Level 2 at Executive Personnel Services (Parsippany, NJ)
text:
This is a year long temporary position 09/08/2015 to 09/02/2016 
Parsippany, NJ. 07054 
40hrs per week 
$32.72 per hour 
Experience 2-5 years Prepare, review and analyze all Month End schedules/reports and provide detailed variance analysis and supporting commentary. Perform KPI analysis for line managers, provide financial advice and support to non-financial customer groups. Liaise with external business partners to ensure accuracy of analysis. Undertake profit and loss/balance sheet analysis. Partner with mkt in developing, planning and implementing the financial goals, objectives and strategies for the brand. Provide input into creating and analyzing targets/latest estimates. Ensure accuracy of forecast inputs and key change drivers. Reporting, planning & budgeting, for Advertising and Promotion budgets. Preparation of NPV analyses to drive strategic decisions regarding growth-driving initiatives. Lead analysis of different sourcing, contracting, and pricing options for new and established products. Understand industry and competitive dynamics, and advise mkt leads on opportunity areas to drive the overall profitability of the business. Analyze P&L financial trends and provide data-driven financial opinions on how to drive the brands forward. Continually enhance management reporting and make suggestions for process improvements and system enhancements to simplify business requirements. Work on cross-functional team to ensure success and collaboration. Some ad-hoc projects and financial analysis will be required. 
Apply Now
